page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Most people like walking and cycling but some alternate about their activities. It is flat in Cambridgeshire so it is a quite good area for cycling and crosscountry running.There are lots of dykes and lodes so people enjoy walking along them so they are favourite walks.There are lots of facilities like choir,junior guild cycling,walking,fishing,horseriding, cricket and football. There is not much traffic so it is safe to cycle or walk along the roadside. There is not much woodland around in Cambridgeshire. Some people go to Rollerbury in Bury st Edmunds,a swimming pool at Bottisham village collage,night classes at Bottisham such as pottery, knitting and history.
